An extensive list of R software for psychometric modeling can be found [here](https://cran.r-project.org/web/views/Psychometrics.html). 

### Cognitive Diagnsotic Modeling 
 - [CDM](https://alexanderrobitzsch.github.io/CDM/index.html) [Package Home Page]
    - *[Tutorial Paper]* [Ravand, H., & Robitzsch, A. (2015). Cognitive diagnostic modeling using R. Practical Assessment, Research, and Evaluation, 20(1), 11.](https://scholarworks.umass.edu/pare/vol20/iss1/11/)
    - *[Tutorial Paper]* [George, A. C., & Robitzsch, A. (2015). Cognitive diagnosis models in R: A didactic. The Quantitative Methods for Psychology, 11(3), 189-205.](https://www.researchgate.net/publication/283496274_Cognitive_Diagnosis_Models_in_R_A_Didactic)
 - [GDINA](https://wenchao-ma.github.io/GDINA/index.html) [Package Home Page]
    - *[Tutorial Paper]* [Ma, W., & de la Torre, J. (2020). GDINA: An R package for cognitive diagnosis modeling. Journal of Statistical Software, 93, 1-26.](https://www.jstatsoft.org/article/view/v093i14)

*[A Comparison of Software Packages Available for DINA]* [Sen, S., & Terzi, R. (2020). A comparison of software packages available for DINA model estimation.
